analysis.description:
SecurityController.checkTransfer (/unique_chucks/19/0x62bf6e1d9424bec0ccbbf35d413d6e7d516e635e.sol#480-533) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- ledger.transferDryRun(_from,_to,_value,lockoutTime) == _value

SecurityLedger.multiMint has external calls inside a loop:
	- controller.ledgerTransfer(0,addr,value) (/unique_chucks/19/0x62bf6e1d9424bec0ccbbf35d413d6e7d516e635e.sol#693)

Reentrancy in SecurityLedger.mint (/unique_chucks/19/0x62bf6e1d9424bec0ccbbf35d413d6e7d516e635e.sol#659-672):
	External calls:
	- controller.ledgerTransfer(0,addr,value) (/unique_chucks/19/0x62bf6e1d9424bec0ccbbf35d413d6e7d516e635e.sol#670-671)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/19/0x62bf6e1d9424bec0ccbbf35d413d6e7d516e635e.sol#671-672)

SecurityController.isTransferAuthorized (/unique_chucks/19/0x62bf6e1d9424bec0ccbbf35d413d6e7d516e635e.sol#450-463) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- expiry > block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/19/0x62bf6e1d9424bec0ccbbf35d413d6e7d516e635e.sol#462-463)

SecurityController.setTransferAuthorized (/unique_chucks/19/0x62bf6e1d9424bec0ccbbf35d413d6e7d516e635e.sol#375-397) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(expiry <= (block.timestamp + 2592000)) (/unique_chucks/19/0x62bf6e1d9424bec0ccbbf35d413d6e7d516e635e.sol#390-393)
	- require(bool)(expiry > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/19/0x62bf6e1d9424bec0ccbbf35d413d6e7d516e635e.sol#389-390)

SecurityController.checkTransfer (/unique_chucks/19/0x62bf6e1d9424bec0ccbbf35d413d6e7d516e635e.sol#480-533) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- fromIsAffiliate || toIsAffiliate (/unique_chucks/19/0x62bf6e1d9424bec0ccbbf35d413d6e7d516e635e.sol#506-508)
	- ledger.transferDryRun(_from,_to,_value,lockoutTime) == _value (/unique_chucks/19/0x62bf6e1d9424bec0ccbbf35d413d6e7d516e635e.sol#524-532)

SecurityLedger.mint (/unique_chucks/19/0x62bf6e1d9424bec0ccbbf35d413d6e7d516e635e.sol#659-672) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- time == 0 (/unique_chucks/19/0x62bf6e1d9424bec0ccbbf35d413d6e7d516e635e.sol#664-667)

SecurityLedger.multiMint (/unique_chucks/19/0x62bf6e1d9424bec0ccbbf35d413d6e7d516e635e.sol#672-695) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- time == 0 (/unique_chucks/19/0x62bf6e1d9424bec0ccbbf35d413d6e7d516e635e.sol#680-684)
